p: Lactobacillus paracasei strain CNCM I-1518 was cultured and prepared using identical conditions as previously described [ 15]. MRS (Man, Rogosa, Sharpe) broth (DIFCO laboratories Detroit, MI, USA) was used. Bacteria were harvested, washed and prepared in sterile PBS (Fisher Scientific, Graffenstaden, France) at optical density 600 nm (OD 600nm) of 1 (Spectrometer, Biochrom, France). The bacterial suspension was stored at − 80 °C in aliquots until use.
